title: Our People - STLA - SIT

meta.description: Find contact information for SIT Teaching and Learning Academy (STLA)'s staff and executive committee, as well as cluster teaching and learning leads at SIT.

text_lines: Come and talk to us about how we can help you enhance your teaching practice and make a meaningful difference in your students' learning.
SIT Teaching and Learning Academy (STLA) Teams
Ms. Nurul Izzati Binte Mohd Izam
Learn More About SIT Teaching and Learning Academy
STLA provides resources and training, and collaborates on educational research and innovations.
Connect with us to request support for or start a discussion about the teaching practice at SIT.

Our People
